text: Ne nep gɨ tɨmel gɨl, adɨkɨd apɨl agɨnɨgab, Tap si tap tɨmel gɨpin ak kelɨgen, yɨp nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agɨnɨgab ak, nop nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Nep ned gɨ tɨmel genɨgab, nop nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen kɨdek nep gɨ tɨmel genɨgab, nop nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen ñɨn nokom olap, nep gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgab ak, gɨ dam dam ñɨn anep kugul oŋɨd amjakek, nop nɨŋɨd kelɨgɨnɨmɨn agak.
